-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ORIGINAL TITLE:          Commando
YEAR:                    1985 	 
COUNTRY:                 United States
DIRECTOR:                Mark L. Lester
SCREENWRITER:            Steven E. De Souza
COMPOSER:                James Horner
CINEMATOGRAPHER:         Matthew F. Leonetti
CAST:                    Arnold Schwarzenegger, Rae Dawn Chong, Dan Hedaya, 
                         James Olson, Vernon Wells, Alyssa Milano
STUDIO/PRODUCER:         20th Century Fox. Producer: Joel Silver

PLOT:
       A retired special agent named John Matrix led an elite unit and has left 
the armed forces to live in a secluded mountain home with his daughter Jenny. 
But now he is forced out of retirement when his daughter is kidnapped by a band 
of thugs intent on revenge! Unbeknownst to Matrix, the members of his former 
unit are being killed one by one. Even though Matrix&#039; friend General Franklin 
Kirby gives Matrix armed guards, attackers manage to kidnap Matrix and Jenny. 
Matrix learns that Bennett, a former member of his Matrix&#039; unit who was presumed 
dead has kidnapped him to try to force Matrix to do a political assassination 
for a man called Arius (who calls himself El Presidente), a warlord formerly 
bested by Matrix who wishes to lead a military coup in his home country. Since 
Arius will have Jenny killed if Matrix refuses, Matrix reluctantly accepts the 
demand.  Written by Anthony Pereyra
